lead_paragraph: When a team is on a hot streak, things just seem to fall into place. That's exactly what happened for the Cleveland Indians in their 3-1 win over the Seattle Mariners on Monday night.

headline.print_headline: Indians Beat Mariners 3-1 Behind Bauer for 6th Straight
headline.main: Indians Beat Mariners 3-1 Behind Bauer for 6th Straight

snippet: When a team is on a hot streak, things just seem to fall into place. That's exactly what happened for the Cleveland Indians in their 3-1 win over the Seattle Mariners on Monday night....
